module.p:
stad ... mionaid ... stops for a minute –
Nuair a ràinig Màiri agus Seumas am monadh, bha na cìobairean aig an fhang agus stad Màiri mionaid no dhà a’ coimhead air na caoraich agus air na h-uain.
When Mary and James reached the moor, the shepherds were at the fank and Mary stopped for a minute or two looking at the sheep and at the lambs. td. 76

éirich ... aig ... mionaidean ... ... rises at ... minutes ... –
Dh’éirich Màiri agus Calum tràth anns a’ mhadainn an diugh, oir bha iad ri dhol do’n sgoil. Dh’éirich Màiri aig deich mionaidean an déidh seachd, ach cha do dh’éirich Calum gus an robh e fichead mionaid gu ochd.
Mary and Malcolm rose early in the morning today, for they had to go to the school. Mary rose at ten minutes past seven, but Malcolm didn’t rise until it was twenty minutes to eight. td. 182–3
